noWallet: ウォレットが見つかりません
wrongNetwork: 違うネットワークです。
switchNetwork: {{ correctNetwork }} に切り替えてください
searchOrPasteMobile: 名前, シンボル名 または アドレス
unknownError: 不明なエラーが発生しました。ページを更新するか、別のブラウザまたはデバイスからアクセスしてください。
insufficientLiquidity: 流動性が不足しています
youWillReceive: 最低でも受け取ることができます
inputNotValid: 有効な入力値ではありません
noRecipient: 送信先のウォレットアドレスを入力してください
invalidRecipient: 有効なウォレットアドレスの受信者を入力してください
yourPoolShare: あなたのプールシェア
noZero: 金額をゼロにすることはできません
totalSupplyIs: 現在の流動性トークンの総供給量は
totalSupplyIs0: 現在の流動性トークンの総供給量は0
tokenWorth: At current exchange rate, each pool token is worth
firstLiquidity: You are the first person to add liquidity!
initialExchangeRate: The initial exchange rate will be set based on your deposits. Please make sure that your ETH and {{ label }} deposits have the same fiat value.
ratioOfPoolTokens: The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool.
happyWithRate: Once you are happy with the rate click supply to review.
whenYouAddLiquidityTip: When you add liquidity, you will receive pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
removingPoolTokensTip: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
enterLabelCont: Enter a {{ label }} value to continue.
label: Label
name: 名前
enterTokenCont: Enter a token address to continue
toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.
expertModeDescription: Expert mode turns off the confirm transaction prompt and allows high slippage trades that often result in bad rates and lost funds.
expertModeWarning: ONLY USE THIS MODE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
transactionSettings: トランザクション設定
connectToWalletForLiquidity: ウォレットに接続し、流動性を確認することができます。
noTokenResultsFound: No results found in active lists.
tipAboutCustomTokens: Tip: Custom tokens are stored locally in your browser
yourTransactionsAppearHere: あなたの取引はここに表示されます
manageLiquidityInPool: リワードプールの流動性を管理する
poolTokensInRewardsPool: Pool tokens in a rewards pool
yourTotalPoolTokens: リワードプールにトークンをプールする
noPoolFound: プールが見つかりません
youDoNotHaveLiquidity: このプールには、まだ流動性がありません
managePool: このプールを管理する
poolFound: プールが見つかりました
useThisToolToFindPairs: Use this tool to find pairs that do not automatically appear in the interface
wrappedTokenDescription: Wrapped token - ERC20 token that represents a native EVM network currency (ETH, BNB, MATIC, etc.). In order the native currency to be exchanged with other ERC20 tokens, it needs to be wrapped. Wrapping the native currency does not affect its value. For example 1 ETH = 1 WETH
deploymentInformationDescription: You can see the latest information about deployed contracts below. Don't forget to save it
allFeesToAdmin: All fees to the admin (no fees for liquidity providers)
feeIsChargedWhen: The commission is charged if this address is set and is not a zero address
youCanUseTheSameAddressForBoothInputs: You can use the same address for both inputs
youCanNotUseThisNetwork: Sorry you cannot use this network
toGetStartedConnectWallet: To get started, connect your wallet
pleaseChangeWrongNetwork: Please switch your network or connect to the appropriate network
resetDomainDescription: All data for this domain will be erased (admin, contract addresses and settings)
youAreDeployingSwapContracts: You are going to deploy swap contracts
youAreDeployingStorage: You are going to deploy a storage contract
confirmTransactionInWallet: Confirm this transaction in your wallet
outputEstimatedYouReceiveAtLeast: Output is estimated. You will receive at least
inputEstimatedYouSellAtMost: Input is estimated. You will sell at most
minimumReceivedDescription: 取引確定前に大きく不利な値動きがあった場合、取引は戻されます
priceImpactDescription: 取引サイズによる市場価格と推定価格の差異
liquidityProviderFeeDescription: 各取引の一部は、プロトコルインセンティブとして流動性供給者に支払われます
routeDescription: これらのトークンを経由することで、お客様のトレードに最適な価格を実現しました。
transactionTimeoutDescription: この時間以上保留されると、取引は元に戻されます。
enterValidSlippage: 有効なスリッページ率を入力します
yourTransactionMayFail: 取引に失敗する可能性があります
noConnectionMethodsAvailable: 接続方法はありません
deploymentSectionDescription: options are related to contracts deployment
feesDescription: The total fee is charged at each swap and accumulates in the liquidity pool of an additional amount in the LP token. You can receive accumulated fees after the removal of liquidity
caseWhenNoFeesCharged: If the total fee is 0%, then no fees, including for the admin, are charged
adminFeeIsPercentOfTotalFee: The admin fee is a percentage of the total fee
adminAndProvidersFeesDoNotWork: Admin and providers fees do not work
fakeTokenCreationWarning: Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens that claim to represent projects
fakeTokenPurchaseWarning: If you purchase this token, you may not be able to sell it back
youHaveToConfirmTheseTxs: You have to confirm these transactions
saveInfoToDomainRegistry: Save information to the domain registry contract
appIsNotReadyYet: Swap contracts are not ready yet. The admin must deploy new contracts to start using this network
selectTokenToFindYourLiquidity: Select a token to find your liquidity
itWillNotWorkIfYouPasteWrongAddress: It will not work if the address is wrong or the token list does not contain this address
backgroundUrl: バックグラウンド URL
listNetworkIdDescription: ID of the network where are located list tokens
listIdDescription: Unique for the network ID value
waitUntilYourAddressWillBeSaved: Wait until your address will be saved
saveThisAddressAsDomainOwner: Save this address as a domain owner
afterMigrationYourDataWillBeDeleted: After migration data for this domain will be deleted. You can access it only from a new domain
instructionToSaveContractsFromDifferentN: If you deploy contracts from a network other than the Storage network, you need to save them manually. Switch to the Storage network, fill these inputs and save it. You can also use existing contracts, but only if they are related to Definance
youHaveToDeploySwapContractsFirst: First you have to deploy the swap contracts
pleaseSelectOneOfTheFollowingNetworks: Please select one of the following networks
youAlreadyHaveSwapContractsWarning: You have already deployed swap contracts. If you do it again, the old contract addresses will be overwritten. New contracts will be without liquidity and fee settings
youAlreadyHaveStorageContractWarning: You have already deployed storage contract. If you do it again, the old storage address will be overwritten. You will lose the interface settings
noPointToChangeAdminFeeWithoutFeeRecipie: There is no point to change this commission until you set the fee recipient address
forSuccessfulExchangeRecommendedToIncrea: For a successful exchange it is recommended to increase Slippage Tolerance to
HelloLetsConnectThisDomain: Hello! Let's connect this domain to your wallet address
IfYouWantToChangeTheAddressSwitchToAnoth: If you want to change the address, switch to another address. If you can't switch, just disconnect your wallet and connect it to the new address.
setAddressAsTheOwnerOfDomain: Set your address as the owner of this domain
onlyThisAddressCanAccessAppSettings: Only this address can access and change app settings
